pkgmetadata.longdescription: Amazon Web Services Request Signatures // Generates version 2 and version 4 request signatures for Amazon Web Services ('AWS') https://aws.amazon.com/ Application Programming Interfaces ('APIs') and provides a mechanism for retrieving credentials from environment variables, 'AWS' credentials files, and 'EC2' instance metadata. For use on 'EC2', users will need to install the suggested package 'aws.ec2metadata' https://cran.r-project.org/package=aws.ec2metadata.
